entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Failure to create an XmlSerializer throws an unhelpful exception #87944
    8.0.0
  • [HTTP/3] [HttpStress] Client failing to connect #87938
  • .Net application aborts at startup with "Failed to create CoreCLR, HRESULT: 0x80004005" on windows server - when upgrade .Net5 to .Net 6 #87937
  • Test failure: Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Generators.Tests.LoggerMessageGeneratorParserTests.NeedlessExceptionInMessage #87934
    Future
  • Happy Eyeballs support in Socket.ConnectAsync #87932
    Future
  • [NativeAOT] HardwareIntrinsics\X64Avx512 test fails on machines with no avx512 (on Windows only) #87931
  • [API Proposal]: Add visionOS runtime #87929
  • Multiple JsonSerializerOptions instances produces System.ArgumentException: Key already in the list #87925
  • Fix how `Linq.Expressions.dll` is built for iOS-like platforms #87924
    8.0.0
  • [ComInterfaceGenerator] Custom enum return type in base interface unrecognized when processing derived interface #87915
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: AddHttpClientDefaults #87914
  • Optimize allocations of a capturing lambda in `GetRuntimeNativeAssets` #87911
  • RuntimeEnvironment.GetSystemVersion returns wrong version #87908

Closed

  • Possible heap corruption #78897
    8.0.0
  • X509Certificate2(Byte[]) constructor fails with certain password-less PFX-contained certificates #87608
    8.0.0
  • `UnsafeAccessor` works on non-static methods #87881
    8.0.0
  • String.IndexOf("'") returns incorrect value in Thai culture #87939
  • [Perf] Windows/arm64: 8 Regressions on 3/1/2023 1:48:25 AM #83216
    8.0.0
  • Avoid keep triggering gen 2 GCs because of low ephemeral space #61428
    8.0.0
  • GC Infrastructure Improvements #77452
    8.0.0
  • SYSLIB1054 code fixer should not generate a code that try to access to LibraryImport.ThrowOnUnmappableChar #79159
    8.0.0
  • Socket API changes mega-issue #33418
    8.0.0
  • Question on generic parameter base types #87918
  • Mono ignores non-public custom attributes in dynamic assemblies #60650
    8.0.0
  • Consolidate UTF8 character encoding implementations #78490
    Future
  • HTTPS Proxy support feature requests #31113
    8.0.0
  • JsonDocument not thread safe at high load #87483
  • System.InvalidCastException: Arg_InvalidCastException after upgrading blazor webassembly from .net 6 to .net 7 #86748
  • [API Proposal]: Stopwatch.ToString() #87449
  • [browser][MT] WebSocket active issues #87839
    8.0.0
  • NativeAOT analysis - enable generation of warnings 2110, 2111, 2113 and 2115 #81156
  • NativeAOT doesnt produce warnings when using Func #73321
    8.0.0
  • NativeAOT will not generate a RUC warning if its inside an attribute #72805
    Future
  • NativeAOT doesnt produce warnings for adding Requires on a static constructor #73172
    8.0.0
  • [mono][jit] Fix float to int32 casting overflow behavior #85316
    Future
  • Lock contention in LoggerFactory.CreateLogger #83609
    Future
  • (Blazor.WASM) Cannot use Debug when using generic attribute #87871
  • QUIC: Validate SslServerAuthenticationOptions set on QuicListenerOptions #49423
    8.0.0
  • Test failure: System.Buffers.Text.Tests.FormatterTests.TestFormatterSingle #86275
    8.0.0
  • Rename `RdXmlFile` to `_DirectivesFile` #79210
    8.0.0
  • NativeAOT: Garbage collector seems to not reclaim quickly #68754
    8.0.0
  • Expand libraries testing #67741
    8.0.0
  • iOSNativeAOT app build failing #87886
  • Assertion failed 'unreached' in 'System.Runtime.InteropServices.Tests.NFloatTests_GenericMath:MaxMagnitudeTest()' #87837
    8.0.0
  • Polymorphism on System.Text.Json source generation with different assemblies #85884

PullRequests

Created

  • JIT: don't set edge weights to zero for inconsistent profiles #87947
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enabled embedded broadcast for binary ops #87946
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add span-based static Create overloads for immutable collections #87945
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Add timeouts to SendRecv_Stream_TCP_MultipleConcurrentReceives #87943
    area-System.Net.Sockets, 8.0.0
  • Handle GT_FTN_ADDR in gtClone #87942
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Support complex gtCallAddr for marshalled pinvokes #87941
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • TargetOS::IsMacOS was not properly handled on X64 #87940
    needs-area-label
  • Use config binding generator in Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Configuration assembly #87935
    area-Extensions-Logging, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0-staging] [mono] ILStrip sorts custom attribute table #87933
    needs-area-label
  • Restructure NegotiateAuthentication implementation #87930
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Fix GenericPInvokeCalliHelper arg #87928
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Complex Rune enumeration over spans of UTF-16 and UTF-8 text #87927
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [HTTP/3] Revert msquic hack in stress tests #87926
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [OSX] HybridGlobalization Implement casing functions #87919
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • Rework JIT<->EE communication for struct promotion #87917
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Relaxing IsConnected Check for Datagram Sockets #87916
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • Remove uses of SR.GetResourceString throughout the libs #87912
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix `--make-repro-path` handling of "ILLinker compatible" parameters #87909
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Delete CLSID cruft from reflection #87907
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Replace EventWrittenEventArgs.EmptyPayload with ReadOnlyCollection.Empty singleton #87906
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Bump SharedArrayPool's max arrays per partition default from 8 to 32 #87905
    area-System.Buffers
  • [wasm] Add interp support for SIMD intrinsics that accept constants #87903
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Type equivalence support in Crossgen2 #87899
    area-crossgen2-coreclr

Merged

  • Adjust determinism tests to store away the 2 different binaries that are generated #87852
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Refactor how diagnostics work in the interop generators #87700
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • Block non-static application of UnsafeAccessor #87936
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, 8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] allow creating CCW for resurrected objects #86882
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Update to the 22.04 debpkg image so we're on a newer ubuntu version. #86803
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Block "Convert To LibraryImport" in more unsupported cases #87503
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • Bump main to Preview 7 #87893
    area-Infrastructure
  • JIT: Induce more physical promotions #87810
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [hot_reload] Give more info about why the runtime can't apply updates #87880
    area-EnC-mono
  • Fix a minor race condition in Monitor's AwareLock regarding tracking of waiter starvation #87703
    area-System.Threading, Future
  • [mono] ILStrip sorts custom attribute table #87923
    area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Fix runtime-extra-platforms failures related to HybridGlobalization #87913
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios, os-tvos, os-maccatalyst
  • [release/8.0-preview6] Bump package version for .net 7 to 7.0.8 #87896
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix metrics test #87898
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, 8.0.0
  • Faster optimized frozen dictionary creation (3/n) #87688
    area-System.Collections, tenet-performance
  • Share UTF8 converters between coreclr and mono #85558
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono] Do not ignore non-public custom attributes in dynamic assemblies #87406
    area-VM-reflection-mono
  • Implement Stopwatch.ToString() #87812
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • add support for https proxy #87638
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • Use internal `BitOperations.ResetLowestSetBit` #87798
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • Remove object[] allocation from CustomAttribute.AddCustomAttributes #87902
    area-System.Reflection
  • Fix contention in LoggerFactory.CreateLogger #87904
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • [mono][jit] Fix float to int/uint casting behavior #86941
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2206976 #87891
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Move NTAuthentication/NegotiateStreamPal back to the mothership #87887
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • Fix passing rpath on Bionic #87900
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • QUIC ALPN list narrowing down scenario test #86659
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [nativeaot][perf] Remove unused _LinkerFlagsToDrop property from the sample app #87889
    os-ios, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Ensure Min/Max APIs are handled for float in VN #87872
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • TarEntry: remove some unneeded checks when extracting symbolic and hard links. #85378
    community-contribution, area-System.Formats.Tar
  • [IGNORE][wasm] CI for running wbt with multithreaded runtime #87895
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm
  • Speed up KeyAnalyser #87590
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Optimizes vector conversions with AVX512 #87878
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Optimize scalar conversions with AVX512 #84384
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Allow unnecessary [In, Out] attributes on blittable arrays and report them as unnecessary #87774
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • [RISC-V] Fix constant preparing for shuffle stub #87708
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [NativeAOT] ThreadStatics part 2 #87148
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [browser] Unify boot config schema and output layout #86255
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • [TEST] noop change to see if tests are passing #85694
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Improve memory utilization in the case of continuous BGC #87715
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Add IStartupHostedService #87335
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Hosting
  • Add Keyed Services Support to Dependency Injection #87183
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, api-ready-for-review
  • Add support for including System.Index and System.Range downlevel within dotnet/runtime #87840
    area-Meta
  • JIT: Insert writebacks more eagerly #87869
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Expose a `Lock` type in preview mode #87672
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Accelerating Vector512.Sum() #87851
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [browser][MT] Make HTTP and WS clients work #87567
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Track last index in parameter marshalling #87846
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [WIP] HttpClientHandler request metrics #87319
    area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Up Minimum CMake Version to 3.20 #86530
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Auto generate Event Ids in the logging source gen #87892
    area-Extensions-Logging, 8.0.0
  • Matrix4x4.CreateViewport #87748
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • JIT: Optimize const ShiftRightLogical for byte values on XArch #86841
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0-staging] dotnet.exe prints error messages to console when launched with empty DOTNET_MULTILEVEL_LOOKUP #87734
    Servicing-approved, area-Host, 7.0.10
  • Bugfix/30024 problem with concurrency type descriptor getconverter #85156
    area-System.ComponentModel, community-contribution
  • Additional JsonNode functionality #87381
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Faster optimized frozen dictionary creation (4/n) #87876
    area-System.Collections, tenet-performance
  • Optimize if range check to replace jumps to bit operation #87656
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RISC-V][JIT] Disable promotion for splitted args #87855
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Inline TLS field access for linux/osx x64/arm64 #87082
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use Span to fill List<T> in more ToList scenarios #86796
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • feat(83547): Adding escaping of property name for GetPath. #84688
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Optimize GetType with known type #87579
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono][interp] Add vectorization for Vector4 #87822
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Add Capacity property and overloaded TrimExcess #85877
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Try adding cross-compilers for Musl #87841
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Add missing compiler-generated attributes to corelib #87857
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Use optimized Index.GetOffset in Range.GetOffsetAndLength #87317
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • [WIP] System.Linq.Expressions.Interpreter.CallInstruction.CanCreateArbitraryDelegates should respect IsDynamicCodeSupported #86758
    NO-REVIEW, area-System.Linq.Expressions
  • Email addresses in same domain not equal #87721
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • avoid allocations for TLS handshake #87874
    area-System.Net.Security, 8.0.0
  • [DO NOT MERGE] Test-only PR for custom perfmap and diagnostic ipc locations #87859
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add support for `--instruction-set:native` #87865
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fire AssemblyUnloadStarted event #87890
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [DO NOT MERGE] Upgrade to LLVM 16 #87190
    blocked, area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • GetProcessInfo3 diagnostic command #87707
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use proper context in initClass for GDV #87847
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-22
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • NativeAOT-LLVM Contributors guide #2292
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Enable tests and fix bugs #2307

PullRequests

Merged

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Do not use helpers for long div/mod/mul #2314
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-22
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Enable dotnet SDK to support targeting iOS with NativeAOT #30068
    8.0.1xx
  • ParseContainerProperties of Microsoft.NET.Build.Containers deadlocks if ContainerImageName ends with '.' #33499

Updated

  • Downlevel wasm tests fail on net6.0.x runtime pack download #32864
    8.0.1xx
  • failed to find runtime pack #32205
  • Native container support does not respect system proxy settings #33230
  • Secrets Management in different Environments #33241
  • SBRP System.Configuration.ConfigurationManager 7.0.0 missing public types #33388
  • [net7] Creating a cross-targeted `net7.0-ios` + `net6.0-ios` packages forces consumers to build with net7 workloads #30103
  • How gets `RunArguments` property evaluated? #32551
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Watch.BrowserRefresh causes Microsoft.NETCore.App.Ref 6.0 prebuilts #30272
  • NETSDK1206 error when building the aspnetcore repo with latest 8.0 Preview 6 SDK build #33486

PullRequests

Created

  • don't install older runtimes on arm64 architectures as they aren't supported #33515
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Set XLF files to be collapsed by default in PR reviews #33511
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [main] fix typo #33508
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [8.0.1xx-preview6] Fix manifest tests #33504
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • [release/7.0.4xx] implemented logging using `Microsoft.Extensions.Logging` in containers #33501
    Area-Containers
  • [release/7.0.4xx] Containers: prefer atomic layer upload and auth fixes #33500
    Area-Containers

Merged

  • Do not look in root for .`config\dotnet-tools.json ` manifest for windows #33282
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix workload cache security descriptors #33322
    untriaged
  • Updating branding to preview 7 #33475
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #33468
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add `--disable-build-servers` to Run and Store CLI commands #33445
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • Enable the task unit test projects in helix and apply fixes to them. #33184
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Support setting workload set versions in global.json #33441
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • MSBuild: SourceBuild TF is NetCurrent #33188
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Container Build: multiple registry push, single archive for multiple tags, tar.gz file writing. #32132
    Area-Containers
  • [release/7.0.3xx] Containers: prefer atomic layer upload #33336
    Servicing-approved, Area-Containers, 7.0.10
  • [Containers] Fix registry operations that use chunks and various resiliency enhancements #33019
    Area-Containers
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'release/7.0.4xx' #33477
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-22
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Proposal: extend the set of things allowed in expression trees #2545
    Backlog
  • [Proposal]: Implicit parameters #6300
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Collection literals: output type inferences #7293

Updated

  • Add details to lookup rules for for extensions #7179

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • EnC: Validate type layout constraints for types with primary constructors #68738
  • Display error/warning code in code style options. #68736
  • Limit code analysis suggestions to changed code only #68735
  • Rude edits not detected when changing (primary) constructor initializer #68731
  • ExternalAccess.RazorCompiler is failing to load in VS #68730
    17.7
  • foreach Convert to LINQ produces incorrect code #68729

Closed

  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-33822.190 #68740

PullRequests

Created

  • Allow client to configure language for resources #68739
    Area-IDE, LSP, untriaged
  • Fix collection literal parsing at the state of a statement expression. #68737
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Doc how to test in VSCode #68733
    Area-Compilers, Documentation
  • Add razor compiler EA project ref #68732
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.7
  • Emit modopt for ref readonly parameters in function pointers #68728
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix assert when using `__arglist` and `in` arguments together #68726
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Readonly References, untriaged

Merged

  • Fix issue parsing collection literal containing lambdas #68734
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add ReportIVTs compiler mode #68665
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review, Next
  • Update handling of collection literals with no target type #68598
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Updated

  • EnC: Implement support for editing types with primary constructors #68477
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Add support for `System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.ExperimentalAttribute` #68702
    Area-Compilers, 17.7
  • Relax parameter-argument modifier matching for ref readonly parameters #68224
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters, C# 12.0
  • Test GetTypeInfo on values given to missing attribute #68427
    Area-Compilers, Test, 17.7
  • Implement "extension invocation" section for methods #68629
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, C# 12.0
  • Crossgen for .NET 8 #68721
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Don't expose MS.VS.LanguageServer.Protocol types from EA.Razor #68713
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Collection literals: type inference #68703
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Publish additional package for razor testing #68725
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Avoid creating a result temp for is-expressions #68694
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Relax value checks for `ref readonly` parameters #68656
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix SuppressMessage attributes working on primary constructors #68706
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Validate diagnostics reported by source generators #68635
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Allow import of Blazor and DotNet JS objects from Blazor WASM startup script #48974
  • Perf regression: plaintext #48973
  • Perf regression: fortunes, fortunes_ef, plainTextWithFilter #48972
  • NTLM Support in Linux Containers #48971
  • Give error if a component is rendermode boundary and has parameter of type RenderFragment or RenderFragment<T> #48968
  • Conectivity issue when upgrading from .NET 7.0.1 to .NET 7.0.4 on Windows server #48965
  • Quarantine UnauthorizedDirectWebSocketsConnectionDoesNotConnect #48961
  • Perf regression: https #48960
  • Perf improvement: connectionclose, mvc #48959
  • Improvements to multipart upload for the streaming scenario #48958
  • No service for type 'Microsoft.AspNetCore.Server.Kestrel.Core.IHttpsConfigurationService' after upgrading to .NET 8 preview #48956

Closed

  • Add AddServerComponents() to Blazor Web App project template #48952
  • Failed to load assembly 'Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.RazorPages' #48923
  • Get the redis tests working on the CI server #28381
    Backlog
  • [8.0.100-preview.5.23276.4]Unable to cast object of type when passing data(custom type) to a component in Blazor Apps after building #48778
    .NET 8 Planning

PullRequests

Created

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2207386 #48970
    area-mvc
  • Remove hosted from blazor wasm templates descriptions #48969
    area-mvc, area-blazor
  • Callsite rendermodes #48967
    Servicing-consider, area-blazor
  • Update JwtBearer and WsFederation to use updated IdentityModel #48966
    area-security
  • [Blazor] Fixes a typo in the components template #48962
    area-mvc
  • Implement ITlsHandshakeFeature in IIS #48957
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • [Blazor] Allow parameters to be both cascading and non-cascading #48954
    area-blazor

Merged

  • Fix typo in OutputCacheAttribute xml doc. #48963
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 8.0-preview7
  • Replace InstrumentRecorder with MetricCollector #48931
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview7
  • Fix 48934 test quarantine. #48936
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview7
  • Update branding to preview7 #48946
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview7

Updated

  • [release/6.0] Backport 48892 to 6.0 #48914
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, 6.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Backport pr 48892 to 7.0 #48911
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime
  • Reduce record usage in published projects #48907
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Update SDK #48908
    area-infrastructure
  • Set Hot Reload controlling headers DOTNET-MODIFIABLE-ASSEMBLIES and A… #48953
    area-blazor
  • Update ProjectTemplates to Id Web 2.12.2 + MS Graph v5 support #48863
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Callsite rendermodes, earlier implementation #48948
    area-blazor
  • Fix F# MVC template #48600
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Corrupt aapt_rules.txt when Creating a Package per Abi on Android #15800
  • RadioButton VisualStateManager has different behavior on Android #15796
    Backlog
  • RadioButton border doesn't work on Android #15795
    Backlog
  • Border background color on Android is different than iOS #15794
    .NET 8
  • Shell flyout layout is incorrect #15793
    .NET 8
  • Editor Placeholder displays incorrectly on iOS #15792
    .NET 8
  • navHost cannot be null after app2app #15788
    Backlog
  • Android .MAUI Hello World Projects crashed after Time Zone change and crossing country borders in Release Mode #15786
  • Label wordwrap does not honor container MaxWidth #15785
    Backlog
  • Android app does not authenticate, when deployed from play store (using IPublicClientApplication) #15784
  • Entry tab "stretching" bug. #15783
    Backlog
  • iOS: Splash Screen Logo Scaling Issue in MAUI Apps #15782

Closed

  • MAUI with Blazor in a separate library -> 404 on static files #15779
  • Bug Report: SQLite DateTime Property Not Loaded Correctly in Framework #15701
  • Rendering of CollectionView takes too much time #15204
    .NET 8
  • [Windows] CollectionView ItemsUpdatingScrollMode property not working #4116
    Backlog
  • Border Margin on IOS Increases Padding #14051
    Backlog
  • Android binding project error on build step class-parse: Unable to read file #15771
  • ShellContent.IsEnabled = false #12478
    Backlog
  • Improve the InvalidCastException Messages #15545
  • Part of the screen does not get redrawn on window resize #15549
  • Best Practices for SVG and Images #15611

PullRequests

Created

  • Streamline ModalNavigation lifecycle events #15799

    area/layout 🔲

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • EFCore 7.0.8? #31122
  • Scaffolding with use-database-names and events table generates invalid code #31121
  • Primary key using `KeyAttribute` isn't being recognized #31120
  • Efcore 7 max pool size was reached #31118

Closed

  • Feature request: add way to override eliminating transaction using SaveChangesInterceptor #31119

PullRequests

Merged

  • Update branding to preview7 #31116
